src:
Mobil 'Ngocok Yuk' Digaruk Satpol PP Padang, Pemilik Keberatan
01 Nov 2019, 18:20 by Jeka Kampai
Padang - Pemilik usaha minuman 'Ngocok Yuk' keberatan atas langkah Satpol PP Padang, Sumatera Barat, menggaruk mobil 'Ngocok Yuk'. Pemilik menganggap langkah Satpol PP seharusnya memberi imbauan dulu, barulah melakukan eksekusi.
"Saya tidak bisa bilang keliru atau gimana langkah yang dilakukan Satpol PP itu. Saya hanya, sebelum menangkap harusnya mediasi dulu. Diimbau, lalu ada penjelasan. Kecuali melawan, baru ditangkap. Lah, ini main gerebek dan tangkap. Harusnya diimbau dan ada pemberitahuan, jangan ditangkap kayak penjahat," kata pemilik Ngocok Yuk, Winda Varesa, saat diwawancara detikcom, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Winda menjelaskan usahanya ini bersifat waralaba dan sudah ada di berbagai daerah. Menurutnya, sejauh ini belum ada yang keberatan terhadap merek 'Ngocok Yuk' dari berbagai daerah.
"Tidak ada yang komplain dengan (penggunaan) nama selama ini. Protes atau melayangkan surat dan kritikan kepada kami. Saya cantumkan nomor HP saya di semua gerai untuk (menerima) kritik dan saran serta info franchise, tapi nggak ada yang masuk untuk memberi saran atau kritik," katanya.


Winda pemilik Ngocok Yuk (Foto: Dok ist)
text:
The 'Beat the Yuk' Car is Scratched by Padang PP Police, Owner of Objection
Nov 01 2019, 18:20 by Jeka Kampai
Padang - The owner of the 'Ngukul Yuk' beverage business objected to the steps of the Satpol PP Padang, West Sumatra, scratching the 'Ngukul Yuk' car. The owner considers that the Satpol PP step should have appealed first, then carried out the execution.
"I can't say it's wrong or what the Satpol PP is doing. I just, before arresting, I should mediate first. Called for it, then there is an explanation. Except fighting, then being arrested. Lah, this is playing raids and catching. don't be arrested like a criminal, "said Ngukul Yuk owner, Winda Varesa, when interviewed by AFP on Friday (11/01/2019).
Winda explained that this business is franchised and already exists in various regions. According to him, so far no one has objected to the 'Ngukul Yuk' brand from various regions.
"No one has complained about (the use of) the name so far. Protesting or sending letters and criticisms to us. I put my mobile number in all outlets to (accept) criticism and suggestions and franchise info, but no one came in to give advice or criticism, "he said.


Winda the owner of Ngukul Yuk (Photo: Dok ist)
